articles.title: Moon Drifting Away From Earth Approximately 3.8 Centimeter Per Year - Study - MSN
articles.description: #Gravitas | Studies indicate that the Moon has been drifting away from Earth at a rate of 3.8 centimetres per year. This phenomenon could impact length of days on our planet, resulting in Earth days lasting 25 hours.
